application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 rear garden: Pear x 1 (Pyrus communis) - lift all round by 0.4m; reduce height by 0.5-1m whilst reshaping; lightly thin canopyT2 rear garden: Garrya x 1 (Garrya eliptica) - bring lateral growth in by 0.5-1m, reducing weight on the tips; thin ends of lateral branches that are not being brought in, whilst leaving the internal growthT4 rear garden: Pine x 1	(Pinus sp) Lift several lower branches to allow more sunlight to get to the Lilac and Yew beneath.T5 rear garden: Yew Common x 1 (Taxus baccata) - Snip in upper half of yew by the shed to bring into line with rest of tree and open up access to the shedT6 rear garden: Yew Common x 1 (Taxus baccata) - Reshape Yew to create tighter shape.T7 front garden Cherry x 1 (Prunus spp): all round crown reduction, back to previous whilst leaving furnishing growth and ensuring the tree is sufficiently away from the house.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
